choices: Continue as Kyle and run from Yoko’s giant, smelly feet
Start the story from the moment that made Yoko a Kaiju
1.content:
It was quiet and busy in the city of New York. Everyone was going about their business like any other day for them. "Hi Kyle" said your girlfriend Natalie, who happened to have the hugest of giant butts in the world only with a gas problem. "Hey baby, what you doing here?," asked Kyle. "I was with my mom but idk where she went," said natalie with a sad face. You put the only strange and horrific face remembering what Yoko did to you when you were shrunk and suffering in her Giant ass until natalie saved you and unshrunked you and made it everything back to normal between you two.

***BOOM BOOM BOOM BOOM***

You look up in a more horror to see the night mare wasnt over. It was Yoko and was more gigantic and massive than ever. Her thighs and her Giant ass were already thraatening as it is between those timy buildings.

MWAHHAHAHAHAHAHAHA SHE LAUGHED EVILY

"EVERYBODY RUNNNNN ITS A GIANT LADY AHHHHHHH!!!!"

I WILLL EAT AND SHIT ON THIS CITY HAHAHAHAHAHA
YOU COULD CALL ME YOKOZILLAAAAAAA!!
1.title: Giant Yoko

choices: Yoko has to take a giant shit
Yoko Squats down to find kyle
The army prepares to attack YokoZilla
13.content:
“This is Susie Newman of channel 5 news where we are live on the scene of the chaos going on in the city. The place is a mess and there’s no telling how gigantic this woman is.”

The army rushes in setting up a barricade and perimeter around the city.

“It looks like the army has arrived to combat the giant mom beast and....”

Susan was interrupted as Yoko’s giant, smelly foot slams down on her tiny news van, luckily susie was not in there. Everyone raises their guns pointing at yoko as she walks slowly towards them with a hurt look on her face. She slowly letting her giant panties fall while holding her stomach tight as she looks down at all the tiny ants while they look up at her.

GROWWWLLLLLLLLL!!!!!!! ***Yoko’s stomach growls so loud, the city hears it

“OH NOOOO....” said Yokozilla
13.title: The army responds quick

info.brief_description: An interactive about a Japanese milf becoming a giant in the city of new york city.
info.description:
Was inspired to make this after i couldn’t find the interactive story Yoko came from. If you are the creator, hit me up, i miss that story lol



Everything is allowed, so go nuts!
There can be giant men and giant women, but try to make Yoko the primary focus, or you can switch it off.
Lets make this a nasty, naughty giant experience :)
